dt: {bc}to turn (something, such as a dish or vessel) upside down usually to cover something {bc}cover or engulf completely with usually disastrous effect
{bc}to pass or go over something so as to bury or submerge it

shortdef: to turn (something, such as a dish or vessel) upside down usually to cover something : cover or engulf completely with usually disastrous effect
to overcome in thought or feeling : overwhelm
to pass or go over something so as to bury or submerge it
